item.title: 微策略公司减记比特币缓存后出现亏损
item.description: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc）在对其持有的价值约 145 亿美元的比特币进行减值计提后，连续第二个季度出现亏损。【原文：MicroStrategy Inc. registered a second consecutive quarterly loss after taking an impairment charge against the value of its roughly $14.5 billion in Bitcoin holdings.】

item.title: 科通芯城在科技股下跌中创下今年最大月度跌幅
item.description: 菲利普-拉丰（Philippe Laffont）的 Coatue Management 公司是全球最大的选股公司之一，由于科技股的暴跌，该公司 7 月份下跌了 3.6%，这是该公司今年以来最严重的月度亏损。【原文：Philippe Laffont’s Coatue Management, one of the world’s largest stock-pickers, tumbled 3.6% in July as a rout in technology shares fueled its worst monthly loss this year.】

item.title: 股市暴涨一天后回落，波动性卷土重来
item.description: 投资者希望度过一个平静的夏天，但却大失所望，因为股市动荡不安，八月的酷暑已经来临，刺激了美国股票指数的大幅波动。【原文：Investors hoping for a quiet summer are being sorely disappointed as turbulence pummels the stock market, spurring outsized swings in US equity indexes with the dog days of August now upon us.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 超出预期，利润同比翻番
item.description: 拉美电子商务和支付巨头 MercadoLibre 公司第二季度的业绩超过了分析师的预期，同时其金融科技平台的用户数量也创下了历史新高，这表明该公司的地域和产品扩张正在加速。【原文：MercadoLibre Inc., the giant Latin American e-commerce and payments firm, blew past analyst estimates in the second quarter while posting a record number of users for its fintech platform in a sign that its geographic and product expansion is picking up speed.】

item.title: Vertex 因囊肿性纤维化药物增长而上调收入预期
item.description: Vertex 制药公司上调了今年的销售预期，理由是其囊性纤维化药物的持续增长以及镰状细胞病新疗法的推出。【原文：Vertex Pharmaceuticals Inc. raised its sales expectations for the year, citing continued growth of its cystic fibrosis drugs and the launch of its new treatment for sickle cell disease.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利出售与 40 多亿美元私人贷款相关的债券
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）正在为发行债券寻找投资者，这将有助于卸下与私人市场基金 40 多亿美元贷款组合相关的风险。【原文：Morgan Stanley is sounding out investors for a bond offering that would help offload risk tied to a more than $4 billion portfolio of loans to private market funds.】

item.title: 南方公司称现有数据中心耗电量增加 17
item.description: 促使耗电量大幅增加的不仅仅是新建的数据中心。南方公司首席财务官丹尼尔-塔克（Daniel Tucker）周四表示，与去年同期相比，南方公司境内现有数据中心第二季度的用电量增加了 17%。【原文：It’s not just new data centers that are driving massive increases in power consumption. Existing data centers in Southern Co.’s territory used 17% more electricity in the second quarter compared to the same period last year, Chief Financial Officer Daniel Tucker said Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储减息步伐缓慢，市政债券创五月以来最大涨幅
item.description: 由于投资者担心美联储等待降息的时间过长，因而放弃股票转而投资固定收益资产，市政债券大举上扬，推动收益率创下七周来最大跌幅。【原文：Municipal bonds are staging a broad advance, pushing yields down the most in seven weeks as investors abandon stocks for fixed-income assets on concern the Federal Reserve is waiting too long to cut rates.】

item.title: 斯塔默收到英国央行的礼物--以及对其预算计划的警告
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）的新政府为继承财政烂摊子而呻吟，但如果其自身的支出计划不出现意外，它也能为英国赢得软着陆的遗产。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s new government groans about inheriting a fiscal mess, but it could also win the legacy of a soft landing for the UK if its own spending plans don’t send that awry.】

item.title: 索玛-布拉沃（Thoma Bravo）打破僵局，数日内向支持者返还数十亿美元
item.description: 在经历了几年相对贫瘠的交易之后，全球最大私募股权公司的支持者们都在考虑一件事：回报。【原文：After a relatively barren few years for deals, backers of the world’s biggest private equity firms have one thing on their minds: returns.】

item.title: 乌克兰向 GDP 认股权证持有人支付 2 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士和乌克兰财政部称，乌克兰已向国内生产总值认股权证（GDP warrant）持有人支付了约 2 亿美元，该证券不属于最近与私人债权人达成的 200 亿美元欧元债券重组协议的一部分。【原文：Ukraine has made a payment of about $200 million to holders of its GDP warrants, securities that weren’t part of a recent $20 billion eurobond restructuring agreement with private creditors, according to people familiar and the finance ministry.】

item.title: Ocado 出售债券代价不菲
item.description: 奥卡多集团（Ocado Group Plc）周四出售了一笔新债券，为解决迫在眉睫的债务到期问题迈出了一大步。但该债券的票面利率高达 10.5%，是目前支付利率的三倍多，这意味着这家食品杂货配送公司的利息支出将更加高昂。【原文：Ocado Group Plc is going a long way toward addressing a looming debt maturity wall with a new bond sale on Thursday. But it is forking out for a chunky 10.5% coupon, more than three times what it currently pays, suggesting a much more punitive interest bill for the grocery delivery firm.】

item.description: 秘鲁首都上个月的通胀放缓幅度超过了所有经济学家的预期，接近中央银行目标范围的中心。【原文：Inflation in Peru’s capital slowed more than any economist expected last month, nearing the center of the central bank’s target range.】

item.title: 债券 ETF 在 7 月份创纪录地积累了 390 亿美元，大举押注利率下调
item.description: 固定收益 ETF 上个月吸纳了历史性的大量现金，因为投资者纷纷涌入债券市场，为美联储开始降息周期做好准备。【原文：Fixed-income ETFs took in a historic amount of cash last month as investors pile into the bond market, positioning for the start of a Federal Reserve rate-cutting cycle.】

item.title: 监管机构反对后，IAG 放弃收购欧洲航空计划
item.description: 英国航空公司（British Airways）的母公司 IAG SA 表示将放弃收购欧洲航空公司（Air Europa）的计划，称在监管机构的反对声中进行交易不符合股东的最佳利益。【原文：IAG SA, the parent of British Airways, said it’s abandoning a plan to buy Air Europa, saying it would not be in the best interests to shareholders to pursue the transaction amid opposition from regulators.】

item.description: 亿万富翁保罗-罗卡（Paolo Rocca）过于看好自由派总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）可能给阿根廷带来的变革步伐。【原文：Billionaire Paolo Rocca was too bullish on the pace of change that libertarian President Javier Milei could bring to Argentina.】

item.title: Citgo 出售听证会可能推迟至十月
item.description: 在一名法院官员要求有更多时间决定中标者后，法院下令出售委内瑞拉美国炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 母公司的计划可能第二次推迟。【原文：The court-ordered sale of Venezuela’s US-based refiner Citgo Petroleum’s parent could be postponed for a second time after a court official requested more time to decide on the winning bid.】

item.title: 格伦科尔亿万富翁前石油主管被英国指控腐败
item.description: 嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）石油部前主管、亿万富翁亚历克斯-比尔德（Alex Beard）与该大宗商品交易商的其他四名前雇员一起被英国最高反欺诈机构指控犯有腐败罪。【原文：Alex Beard, the billionaire former head of oil at Glencore Plc, was charged with corruption by the UK’s top fraud agency, alongside four other ex-employees from the commodities trader.】

item.title: 债券交易员完全相信美联储今年会降息三次
item.description: 由于投资者认为经济数据支持今年三次降息，国债正在反弹，收益率接近 2 月份以来的最低点。【原文：Treasuries are rallying, with yields trading around their lowest since February, as investors see economic data backing up the case for three interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 秘鲁自 2021 年以来首次发行欧洲债券，重返全球市场
